thread.title: Real Madrid willing to let two stars go to get Juventus forward? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
thread.title_full: Real Madrid willing to let two stars go to get Juventus forward? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Real Madrid willing to let two stars go to get Juventus forward? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
text:
Real Madrid willing to let two stars go to get Juventus forward? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers PLUS: Bayern Munich are monitoring Granit Xhaka Share Juve forward Paulo Dybala is hot property (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
Real Madrid really want Paulo Dybala, so much that they’re reportedly willing to get rid of two bright sparks in their star-studded squad. 
Diario Gol claim Los Blancos’s plan to get the Juventus forward by offering up midfielders Isco and Mateo Kovacic. 
Both players have been connected with the Italian champions before, so the move isn’t out of the question. 
But what needs to be answered is if Juve are willing to sell their star 23-year-old. 
Dybala has also been connected more than once with Manchester United. 
But what other transfer rumours are there in Monday's papers? Below are the best lines from around the British press... Transfer stories from Monday's Mirror 
Jack Wilshere not thinking about Arsenal future - 'My main concern is trying to keep Bournemouth in this league' Jack Wilshere is not thinking about his Arsenal future at the moment (Photo: Alex Livesey) 
Pep Guardiola believes Yaya Toure will have his pick of the big clubs this summer - 'He can play wherever he wants'
